inn1.comm: fullish delivery, nothing much on it, there to be driven but Gilchrist mistimes it with a bit too much bottom hand and the ball doesnt go anywhere
fuller still, this time Gilchrist times his drive better but cant beat Gambhir, close in at mid-off
full and wide now, and Gilchrist gets off the mark with a slashed drive through the gap behind backward point, to some cheer from the Hyderabadi crowd
and its a  poor ball, angled well wide of the pads
freebie on the pads again and this time Hayden doesnt let it go, just picking it off the legs and into the wide space past the square leg umpire, easy as they come
full on the stumps again, this time Hayden drives that superbly straight down the ground, with a lovely follow-through, for four more
another overpitched delivery, another firm straight drive but smack into the nonstriker's stumps as Steve Bucknor takes evasive action
good start, good line and length, early swing as well, pitching on off and coming in a touch and Gilchrist tentatively defends it back to Sreesanth
but second ball he strays down leg stump, and Gilchrist doesnt time his attempted nudge to square leg all that well
good one, a touch slower it seems, pitches and goes away from the left-hander this time, who doesnt move his feet and drives loosely in the air, taking one hand off the bat
full on off stump, no room to work with and Gilchrist pushes back to Sreesanth
now theres width on offer but Gilchrist cant time his cut well, chopping into the covers where the sub fielder Karthik dives over the ball and allows two
back of a length outside off stump, Gilchrist gets behind the line and defends to cover
lovely seam position! Pitches on a good length and deviates away from Hayden, who's beaten trying to withdraw the bat after initially prodding forward
slips down leg stump, Hayden goes for the flick and misses, Zaheer appeals very optimistically, no chance thats going to be given out
full on leg again, Hayden flicks into the mid-on region and runs hard
overpitched outside off this time, and its a streakish drive betwen cover and point which is hauled in well by Karthik just on the boundary
pitches full and swings in, Gilchrist gets onto the front foot and drives into the covers where Karthik fields well
back of a length outside off stump and Hayden doesnt want to have anything to do with that, shouldering arms quite comfortably
striving for the yorker, he overpitches on leg stump and all Gilchrist has to do is whip the freebie away up and over square leg for four
yes thats better, pitching on a good length and Gilchrist comes forward and pushes to cover
slower delivery, full on off stump, driven dead straight back down the pitch but ends up making its acquaintance with the stumps, not the boundary, much to Gilchrist's dismay
back of a length, Gilchrist shuffles across quickly to off and defends
good delivery, back of a length on middle and off and seaming in, Gilchrist tries to turn it away but ends up with a leading-edge safely along the ground through the vacant gully area
full outside off stump, just, and Hayden drives with a streaky edge through backward point for one out to the man in the deep
and there's the walk, the Hayden walk, just stomping down and making the ball full, whipping it away over midwicket for four
moves over the stumps, uses the width of the crease to cramp him for room, Hayden walks into it and looks to go legside but ends up parrying it to cover
back of a length, pitching and angling across Hayden's off stump as he leaves it be confidently
back of a length, he gets forward and dabs it wide of the fielder for one
pitches full and wide and moves away off the seam, Bucknor spreads his wings
back of a length, comes in with the arm but Gilchrist is sharp, hopping back and dropping the ball into the covers, calling for the quick run as Harbhajan swoops in
moves back across the stumps and bowls it full, Hayden tucks it straight to Karthik at midwicket
full delivery, Gilchrist gets forward and just laces that, uppishly, into the gap in the covers but the ball is hauled in near the boundary
fullish length and Hayden just murders that back down the ground, between Sreesanth's legs, for another four...man, that Hayden has power in his shots
now he gives him room to free the arms and Hayden does so, getting down on one knee and through he mistimes the shot he still has enough power on it to beat Uthappa at cover
overpitched again and Sreesanth's lucky Hayden mistimed his drive back to him
overpitched again on leg stump, Hayden cant time his flick well at all
good length, slower, Hayden looks to drive but checks his shot back to Sreesanth
banged in short outside off, Gilchrist swivels into the pull, doesnt time it well but gets it over Uthappa at mid-on, running hard and coming back for two
pushed down the pads and Gilchrists tucks it to square leg for one more
moves around the stumps, bowls it short of a length, the ball angles across Hayden as he goes for a pull, misses hitting his front pad and stays a bit low too
slower ball, good length, Hayden gets well forward and defends ... not a shot we see a lot of these days
changes the length again, holding it back on the pitch and using the movement to angle it back into Hayden sharply, to takes it in the midriff area
good length again, this time Hayden comes forward and pushes to point
very wide outside off, Gilchrist needed a fishing rod to get to that
good length, pitching on off and coming in, Gilchrist dangerously gets deep in his crease and shuffles, working it to midwicket
just too full from Sreesanth again, allowing Gilchrist to square-drive through cover-point out to sweeper cover
back of a length well outside off stump, left alone by Hayden
back of a length, width on offer, Hayden leans back and opens the face to run it down towards third man where Harbhajan reacts well and saves runs
oh thats wide, really wide, pitching and seaming away outside off and thats Australia's 50 up in quick time
now he moves around the stumps but still bowls it wide of off and Hayden places it through point for one
well thats even wider, very slow and very wide, Gilchrist does his darndest to really step out and get to it, in fact there was noise on it and Sreesanth isnt happy with umpire Shastri's decision
pushed down the leg side and all Gilchrist has to do is help it on its way with a chip in the air behind square leg for four, great way to end off a pretty average over from Sreesanth
back of a length outside off, driven straight to mid-off
back of a length again, less room to work with, Hayden shuffles to off and drives to midwicket
fuller this time, a touch of swing into the pads does enough to beat Hayden on the flick, catching him on the pad but well outside the line of impact
tight stuff, fullish, slower and on off stump and Hayden defends it back
he walks down the pitch, Zaheer sees it and bowls it wide, Hayden reaches out and steers to point
back of a length outside off, steered to Yuvraj at point to complete the first maiden of the match
and he begins with a short delivery, pulled through the infield out to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, Hayden thinks about crunching it but resists
fuller, tight line, pitches outside off and seams away, Hayden leaves be again
back of a length, Hayden drives it into the covers where Uthappa dives to his right and saves certain runs, good effort from the youngster
fuller now on off stump, Hayden comes out and drives in the air towards mid-on but luckily for him it dies in front of Sreesanth
but thats timed better! Hayden steps out and collects a full ball, hitting high over mid-off's head and the ball drops just short of being maximum
good length outside off stump, but just, Gilchrist comes forward and looks to push into the covers but mistimes it to midwicket instead, running hard and getting one in the end
good length again, Hayden steps out and steers it towards backward point, but failing to beat Yuvraj there
ah rubbish ball, angled well outside leg stump and Hayden loves 'em there, just getting enough bat on it to run it away for four
better, good length outside off and Hayden steps out to work it fine, gets an inside-edge but calls for the sharp single and Gilchrist's just home safe
back of a length, Gilchrist shuffles to off and dabs it to backward point
full and wide, Gilchrist slashes with too much bottom-hand but finds the gap at cover out to the man in the deep
back of a length outside off, Hayden goes for it but misses, Dhoni takes
short and wide, sits up a tad, Hayden crunches it hard but cant beat Dravid at mid-off
overpitched delivery outside off stump which Hayden drives back down the ground to Sreesanth at long-on, just the single this time
short and wide again from Pathan, Hayden slaps it to Yuvraj at backward point
slower ball, good length outside off stump, mistimes the drive to mid-on
back of a length on off stump, Gilchrist gets back and tries to slam it back over the bowler's head, not timed all that well but enough bat on it to pick up four
tossed up on a length, batsman leaves it be with a stride forward
tossed up quicker but well outside leg, Hayden tries to tuck it fine but the ball clips the back leg and runs away
tossed up, Hayden gets a good step forward, the ball lands on middle and off and turns away, nipping the front leg and Harbhajan lets out a long appeal, not out says Bucknor
fuller delivery, Hayden steps out and drive but midwicket is sharp
tossed up outside off stump, he leaves it be well as it spins across him
full and flat now, speared into leg stump, Hayden shuffles and works it to midwicket, and thats a maiden over to start - minus the leg byes - from Harbhajan, good work
short and wide, he cuts but cant beat backward point, Pathan lucky to get away with that kind of bowling, just too much width fromt him

and there's the breakthrough! Pathan bowls it much slower, fuller, and minus all that extra width and Gilchrist just swings across the line, beaten by the slowness, and the ball crashes into middle stump
another slower ball, on a length, leg stump, Ponting tries to work it away but gets beaten by the slowness again, ends up working it back to Pathan
back of a length, defended off the back foot to point
back of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and works it midwicket
full down leg stump, a nice gift to Ponting who opens his account with a nice roll of the wrists, finding the gap behind square
tossed up, Hayden comes down the track and drives uppishly down to Zaheer at long-off
tossed up fuller, Ponting on-drives to mid-on for one
holds back the length, too close to cut but Hayden does so anways and gets beaten
Hayden shuffles around in his crease, shuffling across to off, Harbhajan follows him with a fuller delivery and Hayden manages to keep it out
tossed up on middle and off, tight line, Hayden gets well over it and smothers the spin

oh! Hayden shimmies down the track, looking to clear the boundary, the ball spins on him and he mistimes it, lobbing it up and over the covers and would you believe, hes got enough on it to see it trickle over the ropes
Irfan sends in another offcutter, aimed on the pads, Ponting works it to square leg
short of a length, Ponting swivels and pulls along the ground, swiftly timed but straight to Harbhajan Singh at short fine-leg
on off and middle, pushed to mid-off, they scamper for the single
drifting on the pads and Hayden shuffles and clips it with ease past square leg
Pathan loses his radar and slips that one wide down leg, not quite the line especially against Ponting
better line, more on the stumps, forces Ponting to check his stroke and play it back to Pathan
keeps him quiet again as Ponting defends
poor start for him drifting down leg and a full length as well, Hayden tries to force it off his pads
run-out appeak, Hayden pushes it to mid-off and sets off in a flash, Zaheer picks it up and hurls it back and removes the middle stump, the decision was referred. Hayden is safe
full and wide outside off, Ponting gets his foot across and drives smoothly past mid-off and extra cover
good length on middle, Ponting gets a big stride across and pushes that to mid-on
oho.... just a touch wide outside off, ponting plants his foot across and shapes to slam that, however he changes his mind and lets it go
pushed back to the bowler

sloppy work! full and driven to Yuvraj at point, Yuvraj dives full length to his right, Hayden sets off and Ponting sends him back, Hayden was already half way down the pitch when the throw reached Zaheer. Zaheer whips off the bails in a flash, Bucknor calls for the third umpire. Replays showed that the bails were dislodged by his hand.... opportunity missed for India!
good length outside off and sliced to point
short of a length outside off and slashed to point
Hayden adds salt to the wounds after that run-out fumble by slashing Pathan way over point, it was short and wide and meant to be hit
Pathan errs by slipping that towards his pads, worked off the pads to deep midwicket, zaheer picks it up
overpitched outside off, in the slot to drive and Hayden does just that, spanking that past mid-off, India just losing a bit of control here
defended back to the bowler
good length just outside off, pushed to the off side
good length on off, comes in just a touch, Ponting gets across and works it with soft hands to midwicket, sets off for a run
good length on off, pushed to the off side
on the pads and flicked to midwicket, Uthappa flings himself to his right and saves at least a couple of runs
good length on off and middle, driven firmly to Harbhajan at mid-on

appeal! Harbhajan starts off with the doosra, Ponting goes forward and is beaten. He just about drags his right foot back as Dhoni whips off the bails, the third umpire takes his time on that one and rules in favour of Ponting
floated on middle and leg, Ponting goes forward and pushes to mid-on
floated on leg stump this time, Hayden flicks to midwicket, Harbhajan not afraid to flight it and it's good to see
flighted on leg, hayden takes a couple of paces forward and smothers the spin, searching for the run but cant find it
full, on the pads and worked past midwicket
another doosra, beaten and Dhoni whips off the bails and bellows an appeal, that wasn't even referred, Ponting was safely in
good length, angles into the left hander, Hayden tucks it off his hips to fine leg
slower ball, off cutter on middle and leg, flicked off his wrists to the on side
big nick and no doubt about that! wide outside off stump, Hayden stretches his bat out and tries to slash past point, the ball gets the toe edge of his bat and is easily taken by Dhoni.
short and just a touch wide outside off, Clarke opens the face of the bat and works it past point
pushed to the off side for an easy single
slower ball. line and length on the stumps, Ponting goes forward and defends
flighted on off and pushed back to the bowler
floated on off and middle, worked to midwicket on the walk
tossed on off and middle, holds the length back, worked straight to midwicket
pushed on off and middle, big stride across and turned to square leg
flighted on off and middle, defended back to the bowler
tucked away to the on side for a single
just a touch too wide outside off stump, the batsman watches the ball and leaves it
short of a length outside off, pushed to cover
short of a length outside off, slashed hard to Yuvraj at point
four dot balls in a row, good line and length on the stumps, defended back to Pathan
full in length outside off, Clarke gets a good stride forward and pushes that to long-off
offcutter, outside the off stump, Ponting opens the face and fends towards point
tossed up ever so slowly on off and middle, the batsman takes a few paces forward and quietly pushes it to midwicket
outside edge towards third man, Ponting tries to work it to the on side but doesnt meet the ball off the full face of the bat
short of a length, Ponting swivels and attempts to pull it past square leg, doesnt get the desired placement
tossed on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, pushed away easily to long-on
pushed in flatter on off stump, Ponting gets a good stride forward and pushes it past point
defended back to the bowler
flighted on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
flat on off stump, played to the off side
short of a length, in the slot to pull, Ponting pulls but just beats midwicket
defended back to Yuvraj
defended back to Yuvraj
pushed to the off side
flighted on off and middle, worked across the line to the on side
Legcutter, outside off, Clarke shapes to cut but a lapse in concentration sees him missing it completely
legcutter, comes on straight, defended back to him
another legcutter, pushed off the front foot to cover
short of a length on off and middle, Ponting gets in position early to pull as he times that sweetly past square leg, the ball races away past the quick outfield, Uthappa makes a despairing dive
Ponting goes and aren't India happy! flighted outside off stump, Ponting goes for a half-hearted loft over long-off, Sreesanth runs a few yards across to his left and takes it easily
pushed to the on side
flighted outside off, spooned in the air towards long-off again, that was timed well and fortunately for Symonds, it went on the first bounce to Sreesanth
Clarke tries to work it off his pads to the on side but ends up playing an inside out stroke to cover
pushed back to Yuvraj
pushed down to the off side
round the wicket this time, on the pads, the ball rolls to the on side
legcutter, full on off, driven to long-off
Clarke takes a few paces forward and drives to mid-0n
legcutter no turn, punched back to the bowler
legcutter again and Symonds pushes back to Tendulkar
tossed up on the legs, tries to sweep but misses out, taking it on the pads
flatter delivery, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, Symonds gets down and cutely paddles it for two
short and wide now and he cracks it through the covers for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, Clarke shuffles and works it past midwicket for a brace
fired in this time, middle and off, he comes out and flicks to midwicket
looped up from around the stumps, pitches and takes the outside-edge as Symonds lunges forward and drives, lucky break there, that ball spinning sharply and with no slip its four
looped up well outside leg stump, spinning in as Symonds works it to square leg
loops up a low full toss which Clarke cant really put away, just flicking it to midwicket instead
flatter trajectory, outside off stump, driven hard to cover
shorter on middle and off, he leans back and steers it out to point
flatter ball on leg stump, Symonds gets forward and flicks it to square leg
tight ball on middle and off, Symonds watchfully pushes into the covers for one
moves around the stumps, bowls it flat on leg and Clarke shuffles in his crease, using the feet well, and flicking for one
tossed up gently and Symonds just drives it to long-off for one more
flatter and wider and he reaches out, slapping it away for one
tossed up on off stump, a teasing length, Symonds defends it patiently
tossed up again but this time he uses the feet and soft hands, pushing it into the covers and calling Clarke for the quick single
flat delivery from around the stumps, Symonds on-drives and Tendulkar gets a finger on it but the ball rolls to mid-on
tossed up on leg stump and Clarke drives it in the air, but with mid-on back he's safe
floated up outside leg, he sweeps and misses but Clarke responds well as the ball rolls away to point
tossed up on middle and leg, Clarke comes down and drives with a straight bat past Tendulkar
leg side line this time, drifting down and he paddles it fine for one
again he serves it up on leg stump and Clarke deftly turns it off the pads
full on middle and off, driven well but straight to mid-on
back of a length, punched to a mobile Rohit Sharma in the covers
very full and very wide, miles away from Clarke but he reaches out and gets a thick edge which screams away for four
and again, that ball is so very wide and yet Clarke reaches out and snicks it down to third man ... exactly what is Pathan doing?
tighter line this time but Clarke's too good, just coming forward and pushing it to mid-off for one

back of a length on middle and off, Symonds stands in his crease and tries to whip it away, the ball bobs up in the air and Uthappa at midwicket doesnt have time to react and it lands a few feet in front of him
tossed up on middle and off, Clarke shuffles and drives to midwicket
flatter outside off but Symonds gets the front leg out and sweeps it for two
speared into leg stump, Symonds uses the feet and chips it hard down to long-on
shuffles around, Harbhajan fires it on leg stump but he tucks it fine for one
flatter trajectory, slipping down leg stump as Symonds goes for the pull, beaten by the lack of bounce but umpire Shastri rightly agrees it was going down leg stump as Harbhajan and Dhoni appeal
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
too short, and Clarke doesnt let it go, just swivelling and short-arm jabbing it over midwicket for four, another freebie from Pathan
now he angles it across Clarke, who calmly drives it through the covers for two
moves around the stumps, but theres enough width for Clarke to open the face and run it down to Tendulkar at third man
back of a length, outside off, Symonds goes for the cut but misses and Dhoni, standing upto the stumps, collects it well
fuller delivery and Symonds drives very hard to cover where Rohit does well to field it
good length but outside off and Symonds cheekily steers it from in front of Dhoni's nose down to Tendulkar again, keeping strike
tossed up outside off, Symonds waits and runs it to backward point
comes out, Harbhajan changes the length and Clarke drives it back
dropped! Clarke shuffles again, Habhajan drops it very short down leg stump, Clarke quickly gets back and pulls hard to square leg, where Rohit jumps up and gets fingers on it but cant latch on
flatter, worked to midwicket for one this time
tossed up on middle and off, he shuffles and works it to midwicket for one
slower through the air, very full, Symonds mistimes his drive back to Harbhajan
short delivery on the stumps, easily worked but straight to midwicket
fuller length outside off stump, and thats a good-looking drive to long-off
full again and he drives it to cover
overpitched again, Symonds drives into a crowded cover region and finds Rohit
looks for the yorker from around the stumps, Symonds is beaten but gets bat on it to snick it past leg stump, a nice french cut, if you will
oh thats out of here! Pathan bowls it very short and in one smooth motion Symonds heaves it ever so hard over wide long-on for a big six, the first of the match!
tossed up, Clarke comes out and drops the slower ball at his feet and Symonds reacts well
tossed up down leg stump, nicely shuffled off the pads by Symonds and some top-class running puts pressure on the man in the deep
comes out and Harbhajan sees him, holding the ball back and Symonds defends
fuller and flatter on middle and leg, easily flicked through midwicket for one
short on off stump, Clarke shapes it up and pulls out to deep backward square
tossed up outside off stump, Symonds plants the leg out and drives to cover
Yuvraj from over the wicket, Symonds quietly tucks it towards point
driven down to long-off
turned away to the on side for a single
oops! too short and too slow as well, allows Symonds to rock on the backfoot and slam that past extra cover, the placement was perfect as nobody even got close to cutting that off
turned to the on side for an easy two
pushed to the off side for a single and thats a fifty for Clarke
pushed in flat and short, Symonds capitalises on that by opening the face of the bat and gliding it past short third-man. Zaheer dives in vain and the ball speeds away

full toss on off stump, Symonds advances down the track and smashes it back past Harbhajan who gets a hand to it. The ball was way too quick for him. Cant call that a chance as it was too tough a catch to pull off
starts off well with a short ball which climbs on Symonds close to his body, Dhoni collects it at waist height
good length on middle and leg, tucked away off the hips to the on side for a single
round the wicket this time, big in drift towards the body, Clarke shuffles and works it to the on side
back to over the wicket, slides down leg, Symonds on the glance nearly feathers the ball through to Dhoni who appeals confidently, the umpire turns it down
short and pulled over midwicket, the ball is cut off at the boundary, only one run for that shot though
good length on off and middle, Clarke dabs it down towards cover with soft hands and sets off
steps down the track, tries to loft over the infield but ends up getting a thick outside edge past the keeper
flighted on middle and leg, Symonds steps down with intent and lofts over long-on, the fielder falls backwards trying to pull off a one-handed stunner
and another! short, on middle and leg, Symonds stays at the crease, swivels and pulls hard over cow corner
Symonds rubs it in further by pulling this one past midwicket, Uthappa misfields close to the boundary and thats another boundary
tucked to the on side
full, on off stump, easy for Symonds as he drives to long-off
full, outside off stump again, Clarke drives that forcefully to long-on
heads up! overpitched on middle and leg, Symonds, as if expecting it just stays at the crease and bludgeons that over long-on, the ball goes plenty of rows back

Clarke gets a little ambitious and gives his wicket away, full on middle stump, he takes a couple of strides forward and lofts with little effort over the bowler, Irfan Pathan runs across from long-on and takes it easily
short of a length and just a touch wide outside off, sliced to point
pushed back to Sreesanth and the bowler does well to fling himself to his left and cut it off
good restrictive stuff, on the stumps, Hodge can only play it back to Sreesanth
full, on off stump, driven down to long-off
the line drifts to the pads now as Symonds works it off his hips to midwicket
good length, on the hips and Hodge easily tucks it away to fine leg
round the wicket this time, outside the off stump, the lack of pace allows Hodge to open the face of the bat and glance that down to third man
short on middle and leg, Symonds gives room and pulls, ends up chopping it on the ground to midwicket
a touch too full outside the off stump, driven to long-off
timber! good length on off stump, comes in with the angle, Hodge plays the wrong stroke - tries a cheeky glide to third man. Zaheer beats him for pace as the ball clips the off stump
wide outside off,Symonds gives room to slice that one past point and misses
good length on middle and leg, Symonds mistimes the pull and ends up chopping the ball down to midwicket
just a little wide outside off, Hopes cuts to third man
attempted yorker turns into a low full toss, Symonds gives a bit of room and drives to long-off
full, on the pads, pushed down to long-on
overpitched outside the off stump, Symonds backs away a little and lofts over the boundary in the region of long-off and deep extra cover
on the pads and tucked away to deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, Symonds gives room and slices that past point
good yorker, bang on middle stump, Hopes does well to dig it out
attempted yorker, turns into a juicy full toss outside the off stump, Symonds backs away and slices it past point
yorker outside the off stump, Symonds misses and Dhoni misfields

Dropped, Hopes attempts a slog sweep off a slower ball, gets a top edge and the ball is skied, Sreesanth runs forward to gobble it down ans ends up dropping what looks like a sitter. He makes things worse by conceding an overthrow while trying to run Symonds out at the striker's end
slower ball, on middle and leg, Symonds gives room and aims over long-on, doesnt quite time it as well as Uthappa takes it easily
Hopes goes for an across-the-line swipe over midwicket and ends up hitting it straight to Dravid in that region

inn2.comm: good pace to begin with, 146kphs just outside off stump and Gambhir defends coming onto the front foot, a hint of swing from Lee
back of a length, slight swing, 143.2kphs outside off stump as Gambhir shoulders arms and allow it pass to Gilchrist
slower one, 126.8ks, still back of a length and Gambhir gets up to defend
lovely delivery, hitting the deck outside off stump and holding its line to beat Gambhir as he tries to withdraw the bat .. the ball dips before reaching the 'keeper
down leg side, Gambhir tries the tuck but misses and there's no reaction from the umpire, which really gets to Gambhir, that looked like a wide from here
express delivery, kicking off from a short length and swinging away from Gambhir as he tries to defend, moving past the outside edge of the bat
back of a length, a loosener, pitching and coming in as Tendulkar guages it by covering off stump and watching it dip in front of Gilchrist
back of a length on leg stump, swinging in to catch Tendulkar on the hope, well outside the line of leg .. Tendulkar wants the leg-bye but Gambhir wisely says no thanks, boss
pitched full and Tendulkar eases into a flowing push into the covers where Symonds intercepts it, he just leaned into the shot and middled it
full delivery on off stump, he walks into it but inside-edges to midwicket
class, as Tendulkar stands up and uses the pace of a back of a length delivery to place it through the covers and point for the first runs of the innings
fuller delivery outside off stump now and he comes forward to defend watchfully
short and wide and Gambhir gets up on the toes, chasing it and placing it uppishly over gully, Clarks runs around and fields on the boundary
143ks, pitching on a length on middle and leg, Gambhir works it nicely through midwicket for two more
145.3, stays low on middle and leg but again Gambhir tucks it nicely, though squarer and to the fielder at square leg, Brad Hogg
slower ball, 120.9ks and full on middle and leg, Gambhir leans into it and drives down through mid-on

and thats gone! Lee strikes and gets Gambhir dead in front of the stumps, pitching it full, 130.4ks, and swinging back in to the left-hander, catching him on the hop and umpire Shastri raises the finger of fate with no hesitation .. that would have taken out middle and leg
147.7ks, back of a length and moving away outside off stump, Uthappa gets forward and shoulders arms
138.1 ks, fullish on middle and leg, Tendulkar whips it across the line but cant beat Hogg at square leg
full on off stump and Tendulkar straight-drives, but cant beat the nonstriker's stumps
back of a length outside off, Tendulkar waits for it and then drops the soft hands on it, placing it in front of point for a quick single
142.5, good length outside off, Uthappa leans forward and drives to cover

gone! Johnson pitches full and gets it to swing in, Uthappa moves a long way across his stumps and looks to work it away but misses and the ball hits him on the front leg .. after a careful thought Bucknor upholds the vociferous appeal ... Uthappa goes exactly as he did at Kochi, walking across dangerously
142ks, full outside off stump and Dravid uneasily gets bat on it
142.2ks, short of a length outside off stump, left alone and theres more low bounce for Gilchrist
a touch wider this time, Tendulkar comes onto the front foot and then leaves, Lee isnt amused with umpire Shastri's decision
141.7ks, back of a length outside off and Tendulkar plays away from his body, driving to cover
good length outside off, forcing Dravid back and he drops his head to defend
122.3ks but that short delivery kicked up from outside off and surprised Dravid, catching the handle of his bat and popping up safely before point

oh superb catch! Dravid pokes at a fuller delivery, 145.4ks, and gets an outside edge that flies low towards slip where Hayden keeps his eyes on it even as Gilchrist dives across his vision and cups the catch an inch above the grass! Excellent catch, though its referred to the umpire, and Dravid has to go ... Australia right in the thick of things
slips down leg stump
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to mid-off for one to open his account
144ks, a hint of movement away from Yuvraj as he pokes at a back of a length delivery and then tries to drop the bat
140.7ks, again it pitches on a length and shaves past the outside edge of Yuvraj's bat ... great fast bowling
fuller this time, pitches and leaves him as he goes for an expansive drive and is forced to withdraw the bat at the last second
back of a length outside off, left alone
much fuller this time and Yuvraj now gets bat on it, getting well over it and defending
back of a length, steered uppishly through the vacant gully region
slower ball outside leg stump, flicked in the air backward of square
145.7ks, full and swinging away outside off, Tendulkar leans out and steers it through gully for one
back of a length outside off, Yuvraj plays it uneasily back to Lee
147.2ks, pitching on a length and shaving away nicely as Yuvraj fishes
back of a length outside off, driven off the back foot to mid-off
full and wide this time, Yuvraj kneels down and square-drives backward of point out to the man on the boundary for a single
142.4ks and Yuvraj is in a soup today, his feet not moving as he stands and chases one outside off stump, beaten again
fuller on middle and leg, tucked out to Hopes in the deep for one
too much movement from outside leg stump, moving away and wide called
slower ball, 139.4ks and well outside off stump, watchfully left alone
just too full on leg stump and Tendulkar calmly clips it down to fine leg, top shot
142ks, good length outside off stump and Tendulkar leaves it be
back of a length on leg stump, he works it one-handedly backward of square for one
111.7ks, out the back of the hand, really slow and wide of off stump and thats whats called too
back of a length, played back past the bowler but no chance of a run
fuller, moving in to Tendulkar, who on-drives in the air but the ball dips in front of mid-on, who's close in, not in control of that shot
good length on middle and leg, worked with the wrists to square leg
good shot, Tendulkar hopping up and turning a length delivery on middle and leg through backward square, and even Hogg's valiant chase cant stop that
145.6ks, very wide of off stump but the umpire calls no-ball for overstepping and we have a free hit ... Tendulkar didnt cash in at Kochi but can he do it here?
no he cant, as Tendulkar receives a slow ball, full outside off stump and Tendulkar repeats his Kochi attempt, unsure of what to do and he ends up reaching out and missing
145.3ks on the pads, tucked away to deep backward square for one
loosener outside off stump, on a good length and its left alone
129.7ks, good length outside off and Tendulkar plays it to point
fuller delivery, much closer to the stumps, and Tendulkar gets over it to defend
bit of room there but he cant put it away, just running it to point
slower delivery, full outside off, Tendulkar greets it with a push to Symonds at extra cover
good length outside off and Tendulkar breaks the maiden with a nice nudge through backward point for one
full ball from Hopes, which Tendulkar drives back to the bowler
loosener, full and wide, Tendulkar reaches for it and plays it uppishly to point, theres a bit of yes-yes-no-no but they stay put at each end
fullish on off stump, worked with an inside-edge to midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, Yuvraj tucks it into the gap at square leg and short fine leg does the fielding
full and wide, Tendulkar reaches away from his body and flashes it down to third man, slow running from Tendulkar doesnt do India much good after Johnson pulls off a good diving stop on the boundary
lovely hit! Yuvraj meets a full delivery on off stump with a firm straight drive
overpitched just outside off stump, he drives and gets an inside-edge past short fine leg for the single
back of a length on leg, tucked into the gap at midwicket, Hogg gives chase, Yuvraj picks up two
good length outside off stump, defended to cover
good length delivery outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to bring the bat down in an attempt to run it fine but gets beaten by the lack of pace
a touch fuller and he steers it to Clarke at point, Yuvraj struggling outside off
full again, he plants the front leg out and drives but straight to Symonds in the covers ... just not able to beat the off-side circle .. that ball stopped on Yuvraj
full delivery outside off stump, bringing Tendulkar forward in defense and the ball runs through the gap at gully for one
back of a length outside off, Yuvraj uneasily plays it towards cover and Hopes moves around quickly
good length outside off, he comes forward and pushes to cover for one
good length outside off, he bends down and pushes to point, watchfully
good length, a touch quicker, and it does enough to square Tendulkar up outside off, the ball runs to cover
a touch fuller and Tendulkar pushes to the man at cover
slow delivery on a length, beating Yuvraj as he tries one of those cheeky dabs to third man, and the ball doesnt even reach Gilchrist
a touch wider this time and again Yuvraj cannot beat the off-side cordon, steering it to Clarke at backward point
tidy line, slower delivery just outside off and Yuvraj defends it back to Clark
comes down the track, looking to go downtown, but he mistimes the drive to mid-on instead
back of a length, no room, and Yuvraj can only work it to midwicket
back of a length, middle and leg, tucked straight to midwicket again
opportunity there for Tendulkar to fetch a boundary - full and wide outside off, driven to the covers
good length outside off and shaping away, fended to point
Hopes teases Tendulkar into the cover drive with another full ball outside off, Tendulkar again only manages to find the fielder
good length on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Tendulkar breaks the shackels with a premeditated paddle sweep from outside the off stump. He picked the length very early and set himself up for the shot. Nobody at fine leg to stop that
pushed to the off side, that boundary will ease the pressure a little for India
just a touch too full outside off and Yuvraj executes a silken cover drive. Andrew Symonds does well at deep extra cover to slide and cut it off
holds the length back a little and Yuvraj dabs that to third man
good running. outside off, Tendulkar plays with soft hands and dabs that down in the region of silly point. Yuvraj too sets off in a flash from the other end
round the wicket. full, on off stump, Yuvraj swings across the line and the ball beats midwicket and races to the boundary. The shot wasnt very convincing but Yuvraj will take it
short of a length on middle, climbs on Yuvraj who uneasily defends that on the hop
pushed past point. Yuvraj was a little slow in making his ground and fortunately for him, the throw from Clarke was wide
full, off stump, driven to mid-off
strays a little wide outside off, hardly any pace on that, Yuvraj drives square towards deep point
good length on middle stump, Tendulkar pushes to midwicket
offcutter, drifting on the pads, Tendulkar tries to work it past the infield on the on side but places it straight to the fielder
good restrictive stuff again from Hopes as Tendulkar plays the ball back to him
pushed to mid-on, Tendulkar takes his chance with a quick single and is successful, good running
130.5 kph, pitched just outside off, played down quietly towards point
same speed again, keeps it within the stumps, pushed quietly to mid-off this time
s;lightly fuller in length and Tendulkar picks the gap past cover, however it fetches only a single
Yuvraj innovates by stepping down the track, he carves the ball over cover but doesnt place it as well as he would have liked. Comes down to just a single
pushed to mid-off for a single
tucked away with soft hands to the on side
full in length, pushed to midwicket
defended on the front foot towards cover
steps down the track, tries to wallop that over square leg against the turn, the ball hits the pads and rolls to the off side
full outside off, Yuvraj plays with the turn and spanks that with ease on the front foot past the covers. The ball screams away to the boundary
steps down but Yuvraj checks his stroke and defends back to Hogg
comes forward to another full delivery and pushes it softly towards gully
starts off with a good length ball on off, Tendulkar gets a big stride forward and pushes to mid-off
good length on middle and leg, Tendulkar gets forward and pushes to midwicket
just a tad too full outside off and Yuvraj plays an expansive drive to cover, misfield results in a single
take that! full on middle and leg, a forward defensive push sends the ball screaching past mid-on. Timed to perfection
fullish again, Tendulkar was a little too early on the stroke and he ended up playing an inside out shot back to Lee
Lee sends that from slightly wide of the crease, fullish and driven to cover
flighted on off and middle, Yuvraj takes a few paces forward and lofts that over midwicket. Two quick boundaries, good for India
tries to drive past the covers, beaten
pushed past the covers for a single
defended back to Hogg
tossed up outside off, spins the other way, Tendulkar opens the face and fends towards point
offcutter outside off, Yuvraj gets a big stride forward and pushes to long-off
pushed to mid-on
short of a length outside off, opens the face of the bat and glides that to deep point
good length on off stump and Yuvraj punches that to long-off with the full face of the bat
Tendulkar unfurls another paddle shot and finds the boundary, good length on off stump, he gets in position early and picks his spot
tossed on off stump, Yuvraj gets on his knee and swings across the line, gets the required elevation over the infield and finds the midwicket boundary
tossed on off, gets on his knee and sweeps
tossed on off and middle, plays a controlled chip stroke over mid-off
defended back to Hogg off the front foot
oops! tossed up outside off, Yuvraj attempts another sweep but plays a little too early,  misses completely
full and pushed down the ground hard to long-off, diving stop at the boundary there
flighted on middle and off, driven firmly to cover
welcome Mr Hodge! full, outside off, Yuvraj leans onto the drive and beats cover, extra cover, everything
pushed to the on side
outside off, the ball starightens after pitching and beats the bat, Gilchrist gets excited
pushed in flatter, Tendulkar rocks on the backfoot and punches past cover, the fielder at the deep picks it up
Hogg drops it in short, Tendulkar pulls with the turn to deep square leg
Hogg drops it in short again, Yuvraj waits on it and pulls with force over deep midwicket, brings up his fifty as well
fuller and swept away with force
pushed back to the bowler
big turn into the right hander, Tendulkar defends it uneasily on the backfoot
disaster for India! Tendulkar gives himself plenty of room outside off to cut, the ball lands on a full length and jags back in and clips the off stump
pushed to the covers
full and pushed to long-off
full on leg stump, Yuvraj gets on his knee and sweeps that forcefully behind square
Dhoni joins the party by smacking a full delivery on off stump past the bowler and mid-off
pushed to the off side
gets the ball to turn in sharply, Dhoni watches the spin and punches that to the off side
Dhoni presses the pedal! short of a length outside off, cuts back in, Dhoni gets in position to cut and slams that past deep extra cover, that was brute force
fuller in length, driven to deep extra cover
wrong 'un, full in  length, Yuvraj does well to watch the turn and defend quietly
it's that sweep again but....stopped brilliantly by Hodge at deep square leg, Yuvraj is not afraid to swing against the turn
wrong 'un, beats Dhoni, good delivery to keep him quiet
short of a length outside off, big stride forward and defended to point
fuller in length, gets the ball to swing in just a touch, defended back to Johnson
short outside off, Yuvraj pulls but plays too early. he ends up getting a thick inside edge to deep square leg
slower ball, offcutter on the pads, worked away down to square leg
short, Yuvraj tries to pull, misses it altogether
back of a length outside off, punched firmly off the backfoot to cover
takes the pace off the ball with an offcutter, driven down to long-off
short and wide and Yuvraj gives it the treatment by spanking that past the covers. That stroke was all about power
thudded in on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
offcutter on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
short of a length on off, Yuvraj goes back and pulls past midwicket

short agaon, Dhoni gets in position to pull but plays that stroke rather awkwardly. The ball gets the toe edge of his bat and rolls away to midwicket. The fielder aims at the stumps and the ball strikes Yuvraj's bat and deflects away. Overthrow results in a sigle
full and pushed down the ground to long-on
pushed back to the bowler
full and just a touch wide, pushed to long-off
short of a length and Yuvraj unfurls a brilliant short-arm pull over midwicket, the ball just pounded towards the boundary
back of a length outside off stump, excess bounce forces Dhoni back and he drives to Symonds in the covers
back of a length once more and this time his back-foot drive finds the gap at cover and speeds out to Hodge in the deep
good length delivery, he drives and gets an inside-edge for one
good length delivery, Dhoni leans into it and pushes through the covers out to Hogg
good length on leg stump, gets tangled up trying to flick and the ball rolls back to Hopes
width now and he drives out to deep cover for one to keep strike
starts off with one full outside off, Yuvraj leans into it and drives to mid-off
bit of room outside off but it stays low and Dhoni cuts into the ground in front of point
good length, adjusts the pace on that and Dhoni pushes straight to cover
short and wide and this time Dhoni manages to place it through the covers
moves around the stumps to the left-hander and bowls it full on off stump, allowing Yuvraj the opportunity to drive back past the stumps to long-on
back over the stumps, Clark finds his spot and gets Dhoni into a mess with a well-directed yorker on off stump ... decently dug out to point in the end, for a single to boot
good length outside off stump, the lack of pace allows Dhoni to roll the wrists and on-drive to mid-on for another single as India tick along
quicker delivery,  and its a yorker that Yuvraj just manages to block out
good length outside off stump and Yuvraj drives to mid-off
good length outside off, Dhoni stands and pushes to Symonds at cover
fuller on middle and off, Dhoni gets the front foot out and squeezes it out to cover
short and wide and Yuvraj goes after it, but doesnt time it well and it balloons up over towards mid-off but with the fielder back Yuvraj survives
overpitched, ends up a low full toss which Yuvraj drives expansively through the covers to keep the scoreboard ticking over
back of a length on off stump, Dhoni calmly makes room and gently runs it towards backward point for a smart single
slower and fuller, angled into the pads and Yuvraj only finds midwicket
back of a length outside off, the slower delivery out the back of the hand, steered to point by Yuvraj
hits the deck on a length, change of pace again, stops on Dhoni as he drives into the covers
bang thats four! Full and in the slot and Yuvraj biffs that back over the umpires head with a clean swing of the arms .. this guy times them so sweetly its insane
slower ball, full and Dhoni clobbers it along the ground to Symonds at cover
full again, there to be hit and Dhoni twirls that with some power past mid-off and even Hogg's dive down at long-off cant stop it
back of a length, sits up and catches Dhoni by surprise but he keeps it down in front of the fielders and sets off, but Yuvraj sends him back
back of a length, angled into the pads and it clips the back leg, a muted appeal from Hopes as he realizes it was doing too much
fuller length on middle and leg, Dhoni gets over it and flicks, but cant beat Ponting at midwicket
back of a length again, Dhoni drives back to Hopes, who fields it but the extra bounce parries it off his hands into the covers and Dhoni calls for the single
the thump is here! Lee's pace, 142ks, is welcomed by Dhoni with a firm club back over his head, forcing him to take evasive action, as the batsman stands and admires his shot
back of a length, sits up but Dhoni places it towards point with ease
back of a length on middle and leg, Yuvraj is forced up on the toes and he turns it to midwicket .. good pace from Lee
back of a length outside off stump and Yuvraj taps it into the covers, Clarke does the fielding from point
brings this one in sharply off a short length and it jags past Dhoni, backing away and trying a cheeky flirt to third man

edged and gone! Lee strikes in his return over, landing it on a short length and sucking Dhoni into a leaden-footed flirt outside off stump, the outside-edge snapped up by an all too happy Gilchrist as Australia break a threatening partnership
full outside off stump, driven to mid-off with a flourish of the bat
overpitched and he leans into a textbook cover drive to Symonds
back of a length on middle and leg, he tries to turn it but the extra bounce has him playing it back to Hopes
similar delivery but this time he's over it, driving back down the ground to get off the mark and bring Yuvraj back on strike
this one stops on him as he goes through with some sort of whip-flick that goes down to Hogg at long-on, on the bounce

Sharma doesnt make an impact! Hopes digs it in and the rookie gets up in an attempt to work it on its way, swivelling and swatting it off the hips but finding Lee running in from deep backward square leg, who slides onto one knee and takes a comfortable catch
back of a length on leg stump, defended and Yuvraj calls for the single as square leg comes in
full in the slot but Yuvraj drives it back to Lee on the bounce, thats a dot ball Australia will gladly accept
full and wide, moving away and Yuvraj chases it but connects with warm air
overpitched, looking for the yorker, its a slower ball that Yuvraj picks and clubs it down past mid-off and an excellent piece of fielding from Johnson, sliding at long-off, saves runs
back of a length and wide, Yuvraj gets up and pushes it over the covers and runs hard as the ball drops safely
banged in short on off stump but Pathan plays it well with soft hands, dropping it in front of point and responding well to Yuvraj's call
served up full outside off stump, Pathan square-drives out to the sweeper
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj gets down and sweeps through midwicket

and Hogg strikes on return as well, tossing up a yorker-length delivery on off stump, which pitches and turns into Pathan as he goes for an ambitious sweep with minimal footwork, and he gets struck in front of middle stump ... pretty easy decision for umpire Shastri
good turn, pitching on leg and spinning way and Shastri calls it wide, late
tossed up fuller on middle and off and it spins in to Harbhajan,  who defends it back to Hoog
fuller and wider, another googly beats Harbhajan as he lunges and drives
fuller and flatter on middle and leg, spins in and Harbhajan digs it back out
and his first delivery is a wide, angled well down leg stump
good length outside off stump, Yuvraj uses the feet and meets it with a push into the covers
full and wide, pushed across him, he stands and wafts at it and misses
fuller on off stump, Harbhajan flicks across the line to midwicket and gets one
wider, back of a length, Yuvraj is into his shot earlier and then the ball kicks up and deviates, and he squeezes one down to third man
moves around the stumps, pitches full and brings it in with the angle, Harbhajan turns it to midwicket
fuller outside off stump and Harbhajan pushes to cover
full toss from Hogg and Yuvraj steps down the track and lofts over the covers
fuller, on leg stump, Yuvraj sweeps and takes a single down to fine leg
tossed up on off and middle, Yuvraj defends, gets caught on the pads as the wrong 'un spins back in, loud appeal from Hogg
pushed down to long-off and thats a 100 for Yuvraj! thats his second on this ground
quietly pushed to silly point
this one turns into the right hander and Harbhajan plays it down with soft hands
take that! Yuvraj picks the length early, gets on his knee and deposits that way over cow corner, that landed in the second tier
Johnson comes back well with a fast full yorker outside off, Yuvraj gets his bat down on time and digs it out to long-off
fullish outside off and drilled down to deep cover
another screeching yorker at good pace, dug out back to the bowler
yorker again and that sneaks between Yuvraj's legs back to the keeper. Johnson has come back well since that huge six
fast and full outside off, Yuvraj gets his bat down and plays it to the covers
Yuvraj greets Clark with a scorching loft over deep extra cover. Yuvraj just stood at the crease and made full use of an overpitched ball outside off
a little fuller in length and Yuvraj leans onto the drive and finds the gap past cover. The fielder in the deep had no chance
full and swinging in on middle and leg, flick of the wrists and the ball goes to square leg
slower ball, on middle and leg, Harbhajan turns it towards midwicket
lovely straight drive but.... the ball strikes the stumps at the non-striker's end and deflects to the on side. That was four for the taking

and the yorker sends him packing! Johnson fires that on middle stump, Yuvraj tries to work it to the on side but leaves a lot of daylight between bat and pad, the middle stump flips backwards and goes back about four yards
another yorker and squeezed out for a single
quick delivery outside off, climbs on Harbhajan, he leaves it to the keeper
tucked away off the pads, that was very well timed as the ball raced away towards the fine leg boundary, a good bit of footwork saved a certain boundary
good length on middle, played back to the bowler
Harbhajan steps down the track and checks his stroke as as Hogg cleverly lands it short of a good length
tossed up on middle and leg, Zaheer shuffles and turns it to fine leg
the full toss consumes him. a lot of flight in that delivery by Hogg, Zaheer leans onto the stroke a little too early and ends up spooning it straight to Hogg who takes an easy return catch
pushed back to the bowler
full, on off stump, defended quietly on the front foot
wrong 'un, lands on a good length on off stump, Sreesanth picks the turn and fends it to the off side
round the wicket, Johnson lands it short and Harbhajan backs away and flat bats it over long-off, welcome boundary for India
Johnson goes over the wicket but it doesn't help as Harbhajan clips it off his hips over deep midwicket and brings up a four to follow the six
Johnson loses his line and sends that one wide outside off, Harbhajan stretches out to chase that but it was too wide
tucked off the hips to fine leg, leg byes called
good length outside off, shaping away, Sreesanth is beaten
another ball on the channel outside off, Sreesanth pokes his bat at it and the ball shapes away
fuller and outside off, Sreesanth swings and misses
down leg side, wide called
low full toss, slammed back to Hogg as it nearly carries to him on the full
flighted outside off, driven down to long-off
tossed up outside off, Sreesanth goes for the slog sweep, the ball hits him on the thigh and Hogg appeals
fuller in length, Sreesanth gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes firmly down to long-off
tucked to the on side, harbhajan can't find the gap
slower ball, short of a length as well, Sreesanth charges down but doesn't even get close to the ball as he swings wildly, Gilchrist fumbles and the ball deflects off his glove to third man
fullish on middle stump, Harbhajan steps forward and digs it out to long-on
Clark slips in a yorker on middle and leg, Sreesanth digs it out back to him
timber! Clark seals it in style with a yorker. Aimed at middle stump, Sreesanth gives room to slog, he swings and the ball hits the base of middle stump and sends it back a few yards
